title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
**Unlock the Ultimate Surfing Experience with Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition**

Step into the future of outdoor adventure with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch. Designed for the ultimate surfer and outdoor enthusiast, this watch combines cutting-edge technology with rugged durability to ensure you're always connected and prepared for any adventure.

**Unmatched Solar Charging Capabilities**
- **Unlimited Smartwatch Mode:** Harness the power of the sun with solar charging, providing unlimited battery life with just 3 hours of sunlight per day.
- **Extended GPS Mode:** With continuous solar charging, enjoy up to 48 hours of GPS mode, ensuring you stay connected during even the longest sessions.

**Surfing Made Easy**
- **Wave Counter:** Track and count the waves you catch, perfect for surfers looking to improve their scores and techniques.
- **Max Speed Tracking & Distance Tracking:** Stay on top of your performance with real-time tracking of your maximum speed and total distance.
- **Tide Data:** Stay in sync with the tides, ensuring you surf at the perfect time and place.
- **Windsurfing & Kiteboarding Features:** Get precise GPS position, speed, distance, heart rate, and elevation data for a complete performance analysis.

**Connectivity and Compatibility**
- **Surfline Sessions:** Stay informed with real-time Surfline data and session tracking.
- **Smart Notifications:** Receive important notifications right on your wrist, including emails, calls, and social media updates.
- **Connect IQ:** Customize your watch with apps, widgets, and watch faces from the Garmin Connect IQ store.
- **Garmin Pay:** (Not included in Surf-Edition) â€“ Make payments easily and quickly with Garmin Pay.

**Preloaded Activity Profiles**
- **Running, Biking, Swimming, Strength Training:** Get started quickly with preloaded profiles for a variety of activities.

**Advanced Navigation**
- **3-Axis Compa**ss: Stay oriented with precise directional guidance.
- **Barometric Altimeter:** Track elevation changes for accurate jump data.
- **Satellite Systems:** Leverage GPS, GLONASS, and Galileo for reliable navigation.

**Health and Fitness Monitoring**
- **Heart Rate Tracking:** Monitor your heart rate in real-time for optimal performance.
- **Sleep Tracking:** Get insights into your sleep quality and duration.
- **Pulse Ox:** Monitor your blood oxygen levels for added peace of mind.
- **Respiration Tracking:** Measure your breathing rate during workouts.
- **Stress Tracking:** Manage your stress levels with personalized stress tracking.

**Physical Specifications**
- **Water Rating:** Durable and water-resistant up to 100 meters.
- **Thermal Resistance:** Stay comfortable in extreme temperatures.
- **Shock Resistance:** Built to withstand the rigors of outdoor activities.
- **Case Material:** Fiber-reinforced polymer for durability.
- **Glass Type:** Scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass for clear visibility.

**Size:** 45 MM

Elevate your surfing and outdoor adventure with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition. Embrace the ultimate in outdoor tech and stay connected, prepared, and in the moment. Order now and take your skills to the next level!
